GSD.description:
HID: nintendo: fix rumble worker null pointer deref

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.7 by commit 7c6e6c334154be16740b44dcd7638fb510b9bd91. For more details please see the references link.
